attributes.action: Ensure the Government MUST leave the Customs Union by December 2021
attributes.additional_details:
When we Brexiteers voted to leave the EU it was to regain Sovereignty over our country and it's borders and allow the UK to negotiate free trade deals with the rest of the world.
Theresa May appears to be trying to maintain a foot in each camp with the Remoaners  and the EU and paying lip service to the democratic wishes of the Referendum result. I wish for the days when we traded freely with Australia, New Zealand  and Canada and the rest of the Commonwealth before the Common Market.
attributes.background: This Government give a categoric undertaking that the UK will leave the Customs Union by December 2021 without any EU ties on trade.
